application.name: eis2isis
application.brief: Combine Clipper EIS files into a single ISIS cube

description.p: This program takes a series of Clipper EIS cubes and combines them into a single cube with a unified ephemeris time table as well as a unified camera.

parameter.name: FROMLIST
parameter.brief: List of cubes to stitch together
parameter.description: The name of a file containing a list of HiRISE image files to be stitched together. Each file should be listed on a separate line.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.brief: Output ISIS cube file for the stitched image
parameter.description: The output cube file that will contain the EIS stitched image in ISIS format. Currently, no cube is written out.
